scripts.test:prod-version: bun run build && bun run --bun dist/src/index.js version
scripts.test:prod-version-node: bun run build && yarn node dist/src/index.js version
scripts.test:prod: bun run build && bun run --bun dist/src/index.js generate --input-file examples/turf-js/input.ts --output-folder examples/turf-js/plv8ify-dist
scripts.test:prod-node: bun run build && yarn node dist/src/index.js generate --input-file examples/turf-js/input.ts --output-folder examples/turf-js/plv8ify-dist
scripts.example:hello: bun run --bun src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/hello/input.ts --output-folder examples/hello/plv8ify-dist
scripts.example:hello-start_proc: bun run --bun src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/hello-start_proc/input.ts --output-folder examples/hello-start_proc/plv8ify-dist --mode start_proc
scripts.example:hello-bundle: bun run --bun src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/hello-bundle/input.ts --output-folder examples/hello-bundle/plv8ify-dist --mode bundle --scope-prefix myScope
scripts.example:turf-js: bun run --bun src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/turf-js/input.ts --output-folder examples/turf-js/plv8ify-dist
scripts.example:turf-js-distance: bun run --bun src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/turf-js-distance/input.ts --output-folder examples/turf-js-distance/plv8ify-dist
scripts.example:mathjs: bun run --bun src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/mathjs/input.ts --output-folder examples/mathjs/plv8ify-dist
scripts.example:react-js: bun run --bun src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/react-js/input.tsx --output-folder examples/react-js/plv8ify-dist
scripts.example:trackfootball: bun run --bun src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/trackfootball/input.tsx --output-folder examples/trackfootball/plv8ify-dist
scripts.example:object-hash: bun run --bun src/index.ts generate --input-file examples/object-hash/input.ts --output-folder examples/object-hash/plv8ify-dist
scripts.examples: bun example:hello; bun example:hello-start_proc; bun example:hello-bundle; bun example:turf-js; bun example:turf-js-distance; bun example:mathjs; bun example:react-js; bun example:object-hash; bun example:turf-js-distance
